patterns: How do I handle problems with my boyfriend?

patterns: I feel lonely in my friend circle
responses: True friendship is not about quantity, but quality. Seek those who uplift you, and be the friend you wish to have.
Not all friendships last forever, and thats okay. Growth sometimes means letting go and finding those who align with your values.
Loneliness is a reminder to connect. Reach out, try new experiences, and build meaningful relationships. You are valued.
Dark times does not define you how you rise from them does. Start small, focus on progress, and the light will return.
Meaning is not found, it is created. Engage in what brings joy, and life will slowly regain its color. You are not alone.
Every great story has challenges. This is just a chapter. Keep moving forward, even if it is one small step at a time.

The right people will come when you embrace who you are. Keep being yourself, and meaningful connections will follow.
